auflights is an R data package of Australian aviation activity before,
during and after COVID-19. It brings together monthly domestic and
international route data, airport traffic, air fare indices, CPI,
exchange rates and air-distance tables so that students and researchers
can explore how travel patterns and costs have changed from roughly
2016â€“2025.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`au_dom_routes`](https://tinarj.github.io/auflights/reference/au_dom_routes.md)
  : Monthly top domestic routes in Australia
- [`au_int_airlines`](https://tinarj.github.io/auflights/reference/au_int_airlines.md)
  : International airline traffic by carrier to and from Australia
- [`au_int_citypairs`](https://tinarj.github.io/auflights/reference/au_int_citypairs.md)
  : International airline flights and seats by airline, route and city
  pair
- [`au_int_routes`](https://tinarj.github.io/auflights/reference/au_int_routes.md)
  : International airline city-pair passengers to and from Australia
